channel.title: CVE Feed for Border Loading Bar -- Border Loading Bar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Border Loading Bar -- Border Loading Bar

item.title: CVE-2021-38338|2024-08-04T01:37:16.492Z -- border%20loading%20bar -- border%20loading%20bar
item.description: The Border Loading Bar WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the `f` and `t` parameter found in the ~/titan-framework/iframe-googlefont-preview.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.1.
